page.title: 16Games We Play
page.content: Witches, Fairies. {___________________ To play this game one person is{IT.} They swing a skipping-rope around them saying,"Witches, Fairies, Crocodiles, Cherries," and the others go in a circle and jump the skipping-rope. If they land on witches or crocodiles they become{IT}and the game starts again. Colours { ___________ Colours is a game played with a skipping-rope. Two people are chosen as{ENDERS.}They both choose a colour and do not tell the others. They then swing the skipping-rope and people jump over saying different colours. If they get the colour they have won and the game starts again.
